inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getCustomerGateway.

filters.description:
One or more [name-value pairs][dcg-filters] to filter by.

[dcg-filters]: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeCustomerGateways.html

tags.description: Map of key-value pairs assigned to the gateway.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getCustomerGateway.

bgpAsn.description: Gateway's Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN).

certificateArn.description: ARN for the customer gateway certificate.

deviceName.description: Name for the customer gateway device.

ipAddress.description: IP address of the gateway's Internet-routable external interface.

tags.description: Map of key-value pairs assigned to the gateway.

type.description: Type of customer gateway. The only type AWS supports at this time is "ipsec.1".
